createRole.description: Create Role. Creates a new role.

getRole.description: Get Role. Returns a role by ID.

updateRole.description: Update Role. Updates a given role by ID.

listRoles.description: List Roles. Get all roles for shoppers.

listAccessRights.description: List Access Rights. Get all access rights for shoppers.

applyCouponsToCart.description: Apply Coupons. Applies coupon to the order if the coupon code is valid

getCart.description: Get default cart. Gets current incomplete order

priceCart.description: Price the current order with specified pricing operation

removeCouponsFromCart.description: Remove Coupons. Removes coupon(s) applied to the order

updateCart.description:
Updates Cart. Action to be used only if existing individual subresource api's are not suitable for the given use case. Use commerceItem and shippingGroup API's for individual updates ***
Cart will be updated with the given payload. Only properties that will be writeable will be able to update. Schema is incomplete.

getUpsellMessages.description: Gets promotion upsell messages for empty cart.

listShippingMethodsForCart.description: Lists all the shipping methods for each shipping group in query param or for all the shipping groups in current incomplete order if no shipping group id is passed

listCarts.description: Get All Incomplete Orders For Profile. Retrieves all incomplete orders associated with the logged in user.

saveCart.description: Saves current incomplete order with the provided cart name.

switchCart.description: Provides the ability to switch the current order context to a given incomplete order from the list of saved orders for a logged in shopper. It also supports switching the current order context with a new empty cart order for a registered shopper when no orderId is provided for the switchCart call.

removeGiftWithPurchasePromotionFromCart.description: Update Gift With Purchase Promotion On Cart

addItemsToCart.description: Add Items. Add commerce items to an order. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. It has an optional X-CCVisitorId header param which will be used in case of anonumous user. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.This endpoint returns the order details irrespective of organization ID passed in request header. If user doesn't belong to order's organization, then the user has no access to order.

deleteItemFromCart.description: Delte Item. Delete commerce item from an order. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. It has an optional X-CCVisitorId header param which will be used in case of anonumous user. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.This endpoint returns the order details irrespective of organization ID passed in request header. If user doesn't belong to order's organization, then the user has no access to delete items from order.

deleteItemsFromCart.description: Delte Commerce Items. Delete commerce items from an order.

getCartItem.description: Get Cart Item. Get the given cart item of an order.

getCartItems.description: Get Cart Items. Get the cart items of an order.

updateCartItem.description: Update Commerce Item. Updates commerce item properties to an order like quantity, shopperInput, dynamic propeties etc. Dynamic Properties of line item can be added in the the request using the key value pair structure ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue"). These property values can take the types of boolean, date, float, string, timestamp, enumerated, big string.

updateCartItems.description: Currently this action accept list of items as input payload. This might change in future to Map.]Update Commerce Items. This action updates more than one commerce items to an order. The input requires all the ids in the payload to retain the items in the cart even if there is no update to item. If any commerce id(s) are not present in the input, those item(s) will be removed from the cart. Dynamic Properties of line item can be added in the the request using the key value pair structure ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue"). These property values can take the types of boolean, date, float, string, timestamp, enumerated, big string.

requestQuote.description: Request Quote. Request the quote on incomplete order

rejectQuote.description: Reject Quote. Reject the quote on the incomplete order

submitQuotedOrder.description: Submits the quoted order from the given id in the path.

updateQuotedOrder.description: Updates the quoted order from the given id in the path.

addShippingGroupsToCart.description: Add Shipping Groups. API to add Shipping groups to the current incomplete order.

deleteShippingGroupFromCart.description: Delete Shipping Group. Delete Shipping group from an order. Shipping group can be deleted from the order only if no relationship exists for that shippinggroup. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. It has an optional X-CCVisitorId header param which will be used in case of anonumous user. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.This endpoint returns the order details irrespective of organization ID passed in request header. If user doesn't belong to order's organization, then the user has no access to delete items from order.

deleteShippingGroupsFromCart.description: Delete multiple shipping groups of the current order

getCartShippingGroup.description: Get given single shipping group of the current order

getCartShippingGroups.description: Get list of shipping groups of the current order

relateShippingGroupsToCartItems.description: API used to relate shipping groups to commerce items. Schema is incomplete

updateCartShippingGroup.description: Update Shipping Group. Update single Shipping group of the current incomplete order.

updateCartShippingGroups.description: Update Shipping Groups. Update Shipping groups of the current incomplete order.

listCollections.description: List collection. Gets a list of collections specified by the categoryIds parameter, responds with an error if an invalid id is specified. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language header to get translated content in another language.

getCollection.description: Get Collection. Gets information on the collection specified by the id, responds with an error if an invalid id is specified. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language header to get translated content in another language.

listLocations.description: Gets the locations data avaialable for given query params

notify.description: Creates a client wide user notification.

getCancelReasons.description: Get cancel Reasons. Lists the cancel reasons that can be given while receiving items against a cancel request

getSamlSettings.description: Get Saml Settings. Get the SAML settings

getProductionExperiments.description: fetches the production experiments data from server and stores it in merchant Repository

getProductionFacebook.description: fetches the production facebook data from server and stores it in merchant Repository

getCloudConfiguration.description: Get Cloud Configuration. Gets the configurations from server.

getOrder.description: Get Order. Get an order. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.This endpoint returns the order details irrespective of organization ID passed in request header. If user doesn't belong to order's organization, then the user has no access to order.

cancelOrder.description: Cancel Order. Cancels the order with the specified id. Requires the order to be within the given remorse period and for the current logged in user to be the owner of the order.

getOrderConfirmation.description: Get Order Confirmation. Get an order confirmation details. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.This endpoint returns the order details irrespective of organization ID passed in request header. If user doesn't belong to order's organization, then the user has no access to order.

getAllOrdersForProfile.description: Get All Orders For Profile. Retrieves all orders associated with the logged in user. Also if the user is approver, orders of other users of the organziation which are requiring approval will be sent, Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.

getValidActionsForOrder.description: Get the valid actions for a given order.

initiateCancelOrder.description: Initiates cancellation of in-flight order with the specified ID. Requires the order to be within the given extended remorse period and for the currently logged-in user to be the one who created the order.

submitCancelOrder.description: Submits the cancel order with the specified ID to fulfillment. The cancel order object is created during the initiateCancel operation on the original order.

copyOrder.description: Duplicates an order with the specified ID into a new incomplete order

addPayments.description: Add Payments. Used to authorize payments for order.

applyPayments.description: Apply Payments. Used to apply payments on an order.

calculateRemainingBalance.description: Get remaining order amount for mixed currency orders.

clearInquireBalance.description: Clears inquired balances stored under the state for payment of types giftCards,loyaltyPoints or storeCredits.If no payload is passed all the stored balances are removed.

deleteAppliedPayment.description: Used to delete an applied payments on an order.

getBillingCountries.description: Get Billing Countries. Lists all the configured billing countries and regions.

getPaymentGroup.description: Get Payment Group. Get PaymentGroup authorization status an order. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language header to get translated content in another language.

getPaymentInitiatedOrder.description: Returns payment initiated order that has been initiated with the payment type. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.

initiatePayment.description: Initiate Payment. Used to intiate payment for web checkout, cash payment types.

inquireBalance.description: Inquire Balance. Used to inquired balance for giftCard, loyaltyPoints or storeCredit.

updateAppliedPayment.description: Used to update applied payment on an order.

addProductNotification.description: Create a new product notification, which sends an email to a user when the specified product comes back in stock.

getProductType.description: Get Product Type. Returns all the product types.

getProductsPrices.description: Get Products Prices. Return the the list, sale and complex prices for the list of products. Optionally takes the -ccasset-language header to get translated content in another language.

getSkusPrices.description: Get SKUs Prices. Return the the list, sale and complex prices for the list of SKUs.

getStockStatus.description: Get the stock status for an array of SKUs or products.

listProductTypes.description: List Product Types. Returns all the product types.

listSkus.description: Gets the data and related selected options of a list of SKUs.

listProducts.description: List Products. Get a list of products. None of the image URLS are encoded.

moreProducts.description: Get More Products. Get more products specifically to render on the current page.  The category is detected from the current page route

createProfile.description: Create Profile. If email does not exist in the repository create a new profile with email and password and return the id else return an error message. Dynamic Properties can also be passed like any other attribute ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue").

createProfileAddress.description: Create profile address. Creates customer profile address.

getCurrentProfile.description: Retrives the profile information of a currently logged in user

getProfileSavedCard.description: Get card details for given card id

getShopperSettings.description: Retrives global site level shopper settings

listProfileSavedCards.description: List Profile Addresses specific to the current profile.

listProfileSavedCardsForCurrentSite.description: This action lists requested cards details for shopper profile. On invocation of this action, all saved cards (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.savedCardsMap) and profile specific saved card ids (profileRepository.savedCards.<profileId>.profileSavedCardIds) will get replaced in application state.

listSiteProperties.description: Gets the list of all the site based properties for the current profile.

removeSavedCardFromProfile.description: Remove card for a given card id

resetPassword.description: Reset Password. Used to generate new password for the user, if profile exists with the entered login.

saveCardToProfile.description: Save new card details for the profile

updateDefaultProfileAddress.description: Update profile address to set it as the default.

updateExpiredPassword.description: Update Expired Password. Used to change password of the profile, if current password is expired.

updateProfile.description: Update Profile. Updates customer profile attributes. Dynamic Properties of profile can also be updated like any other attribute ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue").

updateProfileAddress.description: Update profile address. Updates customer profile address attributes.

updateProfileSavedCard.description: Update card details for given card id

updateSiteProperties.description: Updates the site based properties for the current profile. Can be used to update multiple properties of multiple sites at the same time.

listProfileAddresses.description: List Profile Addresses specific to the current profile.

getResources.description: Get Resource Bundle. Fetch the specified resource bundle. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language.

calculateRefund.description: Calculate the refund for returned items. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. It can also have an optional X-CCOrganization header, which is a JSON field to specify the current organization context of the logged-in user.

createReturnRequest.description: Creates return request for the order and returns the appropriate return request ID and return details.

listReturnRequestsForOrder.description: Lists all return requests for a given order ID. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.

getReturnReasons.description: This API returns the return reasons configured

getReturnRequest.description: Get return request details for a given returnRequest ID. Optionally takes the x-ccasset-language headers to get translated content in another language. Also it can have optional X-CCOrganization header which is a JSON field to specify current Organization context of logged in user.

initiateReturn.description: This API initiates return for the given order

validateReturns.description: validates Return requests. It validates the return items for each request. If items are not given in requests it gets list of items from an order for which return request can be created.

initAuthenticated.description: Init part of action that invokes multiple endpoints related to profile and cart

getShippingCountries.description: Get Shipping Countries. Lists all the configured shipping countries and regions.

listShippingMethods.description: Get Shipping Methods. Lists all the shipping methods for each shipping groups

getSite.description: Gets site details specified by the siteId parameter, responds with an error if an invalid id is specified.

listSites.description: List Sites. Get the list of available sites.

approveOrder.description: Approve Order. Approver approves an order, those exceeds the account's purchase limit

rejectOrder.description: Reject Order. Approver rejects an order, those exceeds the account's purchase limit

checkOrderRequiresApproval.description: Check Order Requires Approval. Order's those exceeds the account's purchase limit requires approval

listOrganizations.description: Gets the organizations data avaialable for given query params

getOrganization.description: Get the organization data for given id

listOrganizationMembers.description: This operation is used to get the collection of organization member profiles from Oracle Commerce Cloud.

getOrganizationMember.description: This operation is used to get the profile information of a organization member that is associated to an account from Oracle Commerce Cloud.

updateOrganizationMember.description: This operation is used to update customer name, email, role, status of a customer profile and contact dynamic properties.

createOrganizationMember.description: This operation is used to create a profile in Oracle Commerce Cloud for a customer.

removeOrganizationMembers.description: This operation is used to remove members from the organization by delegatedAdmin.

addOrganizationMemberRoles.description: Add Member Roles. This operation is used to assign organization based or global roles to a user

removeOrganizationMemberRoles.description: Remove Member Roles. This operation is used to remove organization based or global roles from a user

createScheduledOrder.description: Create new scheduled order with the given schedule information.

deleteScheduledOrder.description: Deletes the scheduled order with the specified scheduled order id.

getScheduledOrder.description: Get scheduled order retrieves the scheduled order for the given id.

listExecutionStatusForScheduledOrder.description: Retrieves the execution status for the given scheduled order id.

listScheduledOrders.description: Retrieves the scheduled orders associated with the logged in user.

getOrganizationDefaultAddresses.description: This operation is used to get the default shipping and billing address of a Organization/Account Oracle Commerce Cloud.

getOrganizationAddress.description: This endpoint is used to get address by its id of a Organization/Account in Oracle Commerce Cloud.

updateOrganizationAddress.description: This endpoint is used to update addresses by its id of a Organization/Account in Oracle Commerce Cloud.

addOrganizationAddress.description: This endpoint is used to add addresses of a Organization/Account in Oracle Commerce Cloud.

deleteOrganizationAddress.description: This endpoint is used to delete address by its id of a Organization/Account in Oracle Commerce Cloud.

listOrganizationAddresses.description: This operation is used to get the list of addresses of the current organization.

createPurchaseList.description: This API creates a purchase list for a given site, account and user context. Each purchase list should have a unique name for a given user. Dynamic Properties of purchase list can be added in the the request using the key value pair structure ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue"). These property values can take the types of boolean, date, float, string, timestamp, enumerated, big string.

listPurchaseLists.description: This API is to get the collection of purchase lists. It can also be used to return the list on a searched string and in a sorted order against various properties of purchase list.

getPurchaseList.description: This API is used to get the purchase list information for a given purchase list ID

updatePurchaseList.description: This API update properties of a purchase list. Dynamic Properties of purchase list can be added in the the request using the key value pair structure ("dynamicPropertyKey":"dynamicPropertyValue"). These property values can take the types of boolean, date, float, string, timestamp, enumerated, big string.

deletePurchaseList.description: This API deletes the Purchase list information. Along with the puchase list, it’s sharing is also deleted.

updatePurchaseListItems.description: This API is used to update the purchase list items. Basic operations include add, delete, update. add operation is considered as default if nothing is specified in the input payload.

checkPurchaseListEditAccess.description: Checks the edit access of the current user for the purchase list.

createOrganizationRegistrationRequest.description: Create Organization Request. Request for the new Organization registration is created

createContactRegistrationRequest.description: Create Contact Request. Request for the new contact registration is created

listContactRegistrationRequests.description: List Contact Requests. This operation is used to get the collection of contact requests.

getContactRegistrationRequest.description: Get Contact Request. This operation is used to get the Contact request information for the given id.

updateContactRegistrationRequest.description: Update Contact Request. This operation is used to update the Contact request information, status for the given id.

approveContactRegistrationRequest.description: Approve Contact Request. This operation is used to approve profile request.

rejectContactRegistrationRequest.description: Reject Contact Request. This operation is used to reject profile request.

createMultipleContactRegistrationRequest.description: Create Multiple Contact Requests. Request for the multiple contact registration is created

createShareSetting.description: This operation is used to create a share setting for a resource.

listShareSettings.description: This operation is used to get the collection of share settings from Oracle Commerce Cloud.

getShareSetting.description: This operation is used to get the share setting information from Oracle Commerce Cloud.

updateShareSetting.description: This operation is used to update a share setting for a resource.

deleteShareSetting.description: This operation is to delete the share setting information of purchase list.

createEmailConfigs.description: Create Email Configs for a given Share Setting.

updateEmailConfigs.description: Update Email Configs for a given Share Setting.

deleteEmailConfigs.description: Delete Email Configs for a given Share Setting.

setShopperContext.description: Set shopper context fetches the PriceListGroup, Catalog and AdditionalPriceListGroups determined by ExternalPriceGroup and Catalog Webhook using current context or event sent by user.

oceUpdateContentFlag.description: Updates content flag when data fetch is complete

en.jsApiDocumentationBanner: Oracle CX Commerce JS API Documentation
en.jsApiDocumentationHeading: Welcome to Oracle CX Commerce JS API Documentation
en.jsApiDocumentationIntroduction1: Widgets are used in conjunction with the specific elements, known as plug-ins.
en.jsApiDocumentationIntroduction2: Plug-ins enable a widget to invoke API functions, retrieve state information, send and retrieve data from your application and watch for registered actions.
en.jsApiDocumentationActionsIntro: Actions, which are invoked by widgets, send data from your application to the state store, as well as identify any behavior that should occur in response to a change of state.
en.jsApiDocumentationEndpointsIntro: Endpoints allow you to create an adapter to Oracle CX Commerce REST API functions. For detailed information on creating and working with endpoints, refer to Create endpoints.

addBrowsingEvent.description: Save the browsing page view data for the current user.

checkoutCart.description: Submits the current Order. This endpoint will also capture and authorise payment before submitting the order

getCart.description: Returns incomplete order of the logged-in user

listShippingMethodsForCart.description: Get a list of shipping methods supported for the address of each shipping group id passed in

deleteCart.description: Removes the persisted order for the logged in user.
